facts.title: My Human Design Type
facts.content: 5/1 Projector. I'm built for big-picture strategy, deep dives, and waiting for the right invites.

facts.title: Nakshatras I’m Obsessed With
facts.content: Dhanishta + Purva Bhadrapada — both major players in my chart and constant sources of fascination.

facts.title: Weirdest AI Moment
facts.content: Once, while building a wireframe, AI snuck in a hidden link that… Rick Rolled me. No prompt. No setup. Just chaos.

facts.title: Idea Living Rent-Free in My Head
facts.content: An AI-generated music video for a song I love. Been sitting on it for a year. Still want to make it happen — maybe with the right collab.

facts.title: Something We Should All Unlearn
facts.content: That creativity only counts if you’re doing it a certain way. It comes in a thousand forms and most of them outside the box people imagine.

facts.title: Current AI Crush
facts.content: v0, Anythingai, & Lovable. I used to do front-end dev, and this feels like coming home — but with more freedom, more control, and much faster prototyping.

facts.title: In My Camera Bag
facts.content: My OG Fujifilm X-T2. It's my travel workhorse. Also the last Fuji camera fully made in Japan. I’ll probably never let it go.

facts.title: Favorite Instrument
facts.content: Violin. Played in a mariachi band for 10 years. Thinking about picking it up again...it taught me how to feel rhythm instead of overthinking it.
